Name: LU 261 - Zoning, Tres Puentes - 285 East 138TH ST, Bronx (C 150288 ZMX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150288 ZMX, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 261).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: August 13, 2015 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Hearing Transcript of the Stated Meeting - August 13, 2015
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - August 13, 2015

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on July 17, 2015 its decision dated July 1, 2015 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by West Side Federation for Senior and Supportive Housing, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6a, changing from R6 to R7-2, R7-2/C1-4, R7-2/C2-4 and R6/C1-4 districts to facilitate the development of two new low-income residential senior housing buildings, one 8-story and one 12-story, with ground floor retail space, community facility space, parking and open space, in Community District 1\cf1  \cf0 (ULURP No. C 150288 ZMX), \expndtw-4 Borough of the Bronx \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 150287 ZRX (L.U. No. 260), a zoning text amendment to permit a reduction in required parking; C 150289 ZSX (L.U. No. 262), a special permit pursuant to Section 74-743(a)(2) to permit location of buildings without regard to applicable yard, court, distance between buildings and height and setback regulations; and C 150344 ZSX (L.U. No. 263), a special permit pursuant to Section 74-745(c) to waive the number of required off-street accessory parking spaces;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on August 11, 2015;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 15DCP119X) issued on April 20, 2015 (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 150288 ZMX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map,\cf1\expndtw-6  \cf0\expndtw0 Section No. 6a:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab changing from an R6 to an R7-2 District property bounded by East 139\super th\nosupersub  Street and its northwesterly prolongation, a line 150 feet northwesterly of Alexander Avenue, a line midway between East 139\super th\nosupersub  Street and East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 100 feet northwesterly of Alexander Avenue, East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, Morris Avenue, Third Avenue, and Morris Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li780\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720 2.\tab establishing within an existing R6 District a C1-4 District bounded by a line midway between East 139\super th\nosupersub  Street and East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, Alexander Avenue, East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, and a line 100 feet northwesterly of Alexander Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li780\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720 3.\tab establishing within a proposed R7-2 District a C1-4 District bounded by a line midway between East 139\super th\nosupersub  Street and East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 100 feet northwesterly of Alexander Avenue, East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, and a line 100 feet southeasterly of Third Avenue; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li780\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720 4.\tab establishing within a proposed R7-2 District a C2-4 District bounded by East 139\super th\nosupersub  Street and its northwesterly prolongation, a line 100 feet southeasterly of Third Avenue, East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, Morris Avenue, Third Avenue, and Morris Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li780\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only), dated April 20, 2015, Community District 1, Borough of the Bronx.\cf1\par
\cf0\par
Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on August 13, 2015, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
